progetto.model

Class AbstractGameAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.model.AbstractGameAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddWindowFrameCoupleAction, EndTurnAction, FrameSetAction, PickDiceAction, PlaceDiceAction, SetPlayerCountAction, SetSeedAction, StartGameAction

    public abstract class AbstractGameAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the class every command must be derived from. every derived class must implement canBeExecuted and execute.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
